metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17632 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Eclipse Jetty versions 9.4.21.v20190926, 9.4.22.v20191022, and 9.4.23.v20191118, the generation of default unhandled Error response content (in text/html and text/json Content-Type) does not escape Exception messages in stacktraces included in error output.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17632` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jetty9 - 9.4.26-1
libjetty9-extra-java - 9.4.26-1
libjetty9-java - 9.4.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.4.26-1').
